 All in all, I'd give this phone a 4.5/5 rating.

The build quality feels premium, and the display is vibrant and responsive. iOS took a bit to get used to, but it's clean, fast, and intuitive. I do miss some Android customizations, but overall, the switch feels like an upgrade. Definitely worth switching.
